credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Papal escutcheon
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red ink at upper edge
description: Horizontal rectangle. Supported by two winged female genii, the right one having a trumpet in her left arm. In front of a niche which is supported by a base. The background is colored. Written in the upper right corner: "36".
name: Drawing
